meanings.definition: A soft, warm covering for the foot, typically worn in bed.
meanings.sent1: I wore my cozy bedsock to keep my feet warm at night.
meanings.sent2: She slipped on her bedsock before getting into bed.
meanings.sent3: The cat mistook my bedsock for a toy and started playing with it.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the room like a pair of bedsocks on a wooden floor.
meanings.sent5: The bedsock felt like a hug for my toes on the chilly night.

meanings.sent1: I always bedsock my grandma to make sure she stays warm.
meanings.sent2: The nurse will bedsock the patients before they go to sleep.
meanings.sent3: He tried to bedsock his dog, but the playful pup kept running away.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness bedsocked me like a warm embrace on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The act of bedsocking others brings comfort and care to those in need.

meanings.sent1: I bought a new pair of bedsocks to replace my old ones.
meanings.sent2: The bedsocks lay neatly folded at the foot of the bed.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy ran off with one bedsock, leaving its mate behind.
meanings.sent4: The bedsocks danced on the laundry line in the gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bedsocks added a cheerful touch to the otherwise plain room.
